# StringExtensions.FromBase64 method

Decodes the input String in base64 using specified encoding, if not specified by default the UTF8 encoding is used.

```csharp
public static string FromBase64(this string value, Encoding encoding = null)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| value | Base64 value to decode |
| encoding | Encoding to use |

## Return Value

Returns a new String that uses the specified encoding.
